Room.Name: Oceanview Drive/Hillcrest Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillcrest Drive and Oceanview Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Oceanview Drive is a rather scenic route used primarily by visitors to Oceancrest to get out of the crowded Main Street. It runs from the Nylandian Bay to the south wall and southern shopping district. Hillcrest is another large road which provides primary access to most of the large estates located to the east in the fairly well-off sections of Oceancrest. The Dragon Tooth Inn is north of here.
